title: How long have Justin and Hailey Bieber been together?
text:
Justin and Hailey tied the knot last month (Picture: Instagram/Hailey Bieber)

They are one of Instagram’s hottest celebrity couples (especially since Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott called it quits) and now Justin and Hailey Bieber are raking in millions of likes again for their new wedding pictures.

Shot in black and white at their star-studded nuptials last weekend, Justin and Hailey’s wedding photos have caused quite the stir online – especially as they have finally revealed what the bride’s much-discussed wedding dress looked like.

Hailey chose a lace off-the-shoulder, long-sleeve dress designed by Virgil Abloh for the occasion.

The dress had a mermaid-style skirt and long, sheer veil that featured lettering saying ‘Till Death Do Us Part’ in designer Virgil’s signature block style.

So now they’ve shared their swoon-worthy wedding pics, let’s take a look back at where the romance between Justin and Hailey started.

How long have Justin and Hailey been together?

Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin, as she was known back then, first met a decade ago when she was just known as Stephen Baldwin’s daughter and Justin was a teen pop sensation.

Their meeting in 2009 was brief and the pair weren’t officially linked romantically until the very start of 2016, when they were pictured kissing as they celebrated New Year’s Eve today on December 31 2015 in Anguilla.

The early days of their romance didn’t go too smoothly for the couple, as they split later that year with Justin briefly linked to Lionel Richie’s daughter Sofia Richie before rekindling his romance with his first love, singer Selena Gomez.

Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber dated on and off before splitting for good in 2017 (Picture: Noel Vasquez/Getty Images)

Just when Jelena fans thought that the childhood sweethearts were going to make it all the way, Justin and Selena split again, and this time for good.

Just last year in 2018, Justin and Hailey confirmed that they had got back together and their blossoming love was documented all over on social media as their relationship went from strength to strength.

By July 2018 the pair were engaged after Justin popped the question in the Bahamas and then, just two months later, the couple made it official by getting married in a courthouse in New York City.

Although they have been officially married since September 2018, Justin and Hailey didn’t throw a wedding party until last month, re-doing their vows in a huge official wedding ceremony at the luxury Montage Palmetto Bluffs resort in South Carolina in front of family, friends and plenty of celebs.
